text: The World Owes Me a Living is a 1945 British World War II drama movie directed by Vernon Sewell and was based on the novel by John Llewellyn Rhys. It stars David Farrar, Judy Campbell, Jack Livesey, Eric Barker, Sonia Dresdel, Anthony Hawtrey, Wylie Watson, Stewart Rome and Amy Veness. ==Other websites== * * Category:1945 war movies Category:1945 drama movies Category:British war movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Vernon Sewell Category:Movies about amnesia
title: The World Owes Me a Living
